motivation: Sometimes later, becomes never, do it now . . .

about.my: My name's Oybek. Last name Mukhiddinov. I'm 20 years old. I'm from Gizhduvan district, Bukhara region, Uzbekistan.
about.experience-text: I chose web programming because I have been interested in programming since I was young. My main programming language is JavaScript. I am currently writing code in the JavaScript framework Vue. I have worked on many freelance projects before. I have been working for UDEVS since August 2020. I have almost 1 year of experience. I will soon learn Node js and become a FullStack programmer
